Description: String of standard truncated convex bicone, barrel, spherical and lenticular cornelian beads. The latter are mostly flattened standard convex bicone in shape.
Curator's comments: Cf. C. M. Firth, ‘Archaeological Survey of Nubia, 1910-11’ (Cairo, 1927), pl. 28a, 8: Middle Kingdom. For similar lenticular beads in a cornelian string cf. Earl of Carnarvon & H. Carter, 'Five Years' Exploration at Thebes, 1907-11' (London, 1912), pl.XLVI, 2C: Middle Kingdom.
Bibliographic references: Andrews 1981 / Catalogue of Egyptian Antiquities. Jewellery I (495)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: R J Moss & Co
